title: kunram kuDi
sahitya:
kunram kuDi koNDa vElavA kuramAdu maruvu param


anupallavi

  manram kulaviya naTanashikhAmaNi pudalvanE mayilmishai varum tirupparam


caraNam    unran pugazh kanavilum oru kaNamum marandirundu ariyEnE unran karuNai
 shiridum varavilaiyE enran tuyar shiridum ozhiyavilai iraivanE arumaraiyoli
 mighu tirupparam
